original_text: Moreover, the light of the moon will be as the light of the sun, and the light of the sun will be sevenfold, as the light of seven days, in the day when the Lord binds up the brokenness of his people, and heals the wounds inflicted by his blow.
korean_text: 여호와께서 자기 백성의 상처를 싸매시며 그들의 맞은 자리를 고치시는 날에는 달빛은 햇빛 같겠고 햇빛은 일곱 배가 되어 일곱 날의 빛과 같으리라

sentences.original_text: the light of the moon will be as the light of the sun,
and the light of the sun will be sevenfold,
as the light of seven days,
in the day when the Lord binds up the brokenness of his people,
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그 백성의 부서진 상처를 싸매시고,

sentences.original_text: and heals the wounds inflicted by his blow.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 치매한 매 맞은 상처를 고치시는 날에.
